official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 in order to protect the rights of the general public in the television broadcasting of major sports events.

summary.text: Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to require the Federal Communications Commission to make such rules and regulations as are necessary and appropriate with regard to major sports programming that may be provided by pay television.
